pkgmetadata.longdescription: Controller Layer for Biomon App Data Analysis // Biomon app is a software for data analysis automation in Biomonitoring. The implementation is split in three packages taking into account the development model Models-Views-Controllers. Each of these layers supported by a different package: The package Analyz concerns the Models layer of Biomon app; BiomonCore concerns the Controllers layer and Biomon concerns the Views layer. BiomonCore delivers two classes, the class Global prepares the global environment for Biomon app execution and the class Action that delivers methods to deal with the user's requests from the interface, the View layer, and forward them to the methods defined in the Model layer.
